document.full_text: republican leaders promise a floor vote on the bill, which would repeal an agency finding on heat-trapping gases and bar the agency from imposing new rules to control them.
document.title: house panel votes to limit e.p.a. power
lines_and_colors: republican leaders promise a floor vote on the bill, which would repeal an agency finding on heat-trapping gases and bar the agency from imposing new rules to control them.
